commit.message: BootClassPathZipFileTest: Switch to createClassBytes, createZip static functions
BootClassPathZip64Test: Delete class file in finally block
BootClassPathZip64Test: Generate ZIP file dynamically, if possible

BootClassPathZip64Test: Do not attempt to delete the ZIP file

Leave deletion to the test harness instead, to avoid this on
windows-x64:

command: main -Xbootclasspath/a:./Zip64.zip BootClassPathZip64Test
reason: User specified action: run main/othervm -Xbootclasspath/a:./Zip64.zip BootClassPathZip64Test

8334048: -Xbootclasspath can not read some ZIP64 zip files
